actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House with respect to equitable application of energy conservation plans and energy resources to the travel and tourism industry, and to insure the compatibility of travel and tourism with other national interests in energy development and conservation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the equitable application of energy conservation policy or allocation of energy supplies in the event of a severe energy shortage should be strictly observed.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House with respect to equitable application of energy conservation plans and energy resources to the travel and tourism industry, and to insure the compatibility of travel and tourism with other national interests in energy development and conservation.
